frontmatter.title: Section
frontmatter.description: Layout.Section is an outer block element for wrapping content to get the correnct layout and spacing between sections and section headings.

frontmatter.title: Card
frontmatter.description: Layout.Card is a block section element showing the white box with rounded gray borders, adding spacing automatically.

frontmatter.title: FlexContainer
frontmatter.description: Layout.FlexContainer is a building block for flexbox based layout of contents and components.

frontmatter.title: FlexItem
frontmatter.description: Layout.FlexItem is a building block for flexbox based layout of contents and components.

frontmatter.title: MainHeading
frontmatter.description: Layout.MainHeading is a standardized main heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: SubHeading
frontmatter.description: Layout.SubHeading is a standardized sub heading for sections, ensuring default layout, spacing etc.

frontmatter.title: InfoCardSection
frontmatter.description: Layout.InfoCardSection is a wrapper component for InfoCard, ensuring correct layout together with other Sections

frontmatter.title: ButtonRow
frontmatter.description: Layout.ButtonRow is a wrapper for horizontally separated buttons.

frontmatter.title: Column
frontmatter.description: Layout.Column is a simplified wrapper for FlexContainer with direction column.

frontmatter.title: Row
frontmatter.description: Layout.Row is a simplified wrapper for FlexContainer with direction row.
